title: 2004 Porsche 911 GT3 For Sale With 8,000 Miles: Sports Car Perfection For Mustang Money
description: If you want a new 911 GT3, not only do you need at least $230,500, but you also need to have a close relationship with your local Porsche dealer, and that is only fostered through years of buying other, "lesser" Porsches. The alternative? Buy one that isn't brand new, like this 2004 example with ...

descriptionSummary: Porsche enthusiasts willing to splurge on the coveted 911 GT3 will need a substantial bankroll – at least $230,500 – and a well-established connection with their local dealership, often built over years of purchasing other Porsche models. Alternatively, consider a pre-owned model like this 2004 example.

title: Sung Kang Returns to the Big Screen with a V8-Powered Toyota AE86
description: Actor and filmmaker Sung Kang, best known for his role as Han Lue in the Fast and Furious franchise, is returning to the world of high-performance cars with his latest project, Drifter. The upcoming feature film blends motorsport realism with a heartfelt story of purpose and community, and now, ...

descriptionSummary: Sung Kang, star of the Fast and Furious series, is revving up the engine on his new passion project, Drifter. This gritty drama combines high-stakes racing with a poignant tale of belonging and redemption, showcasing Kang's growing talent as a filmmaker.

title: A Different Kind of Hyundai Santa Fe is Coming to North America
description: Hyundai’s fifth-generation Santa Fe hasn’t been around for long, but the brand is already working on a facelifted version. Prototypes have been spotted this year with updated lighting, revised grille details, and what looks like a slightly tweaked front fascia. Inside, the SUV is expected to ...

title: How a Stolen Dodge Hellcat Redeye Took Down an Alabama Chop Shop
description: When police started looking into the theft of a Dodge Challenger SRT Hellcat Redeye from Hendersonville, Tennessee, in late September, they had no idea it would lead them across state lines, let alone bust a co-ordinated criminal enterprise. descriptionSummary: A high-stakes theft investigation in Tennessee's Hendersonville sparked an unexpected cross-country pursuit, ultimately unraveling a complex web of crime that spanned state borders and revealed a sophisticated organized scheme.

title: All-New Hyundai Venue Debuts as Korea’s Answer to the Chevy Trax
description: The 2026 Hyundai Venue was only recently announced for the U.S. with a streamlined lineup, but an all-new model has already been revealed via the brand's Indian website. Expected to be launched here for the 2027 model year, this is the new generation of Hyundai’s smallest and cheapest crossover in ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai Unveils Compact Crossover Challenger to Chevrolet's Trax in Global Market"
descriptionSummary: Hyundai's compact Venue crossover has undergone significant changes, and a completely revamped model has just been unveiled online, hinting at an updated U.S. lineup set to debut as a 2027 model.

title: Americans Are Warming Up to Chinese Cars — Even If They Can’t Buy Them Yet
description: Chinese automakers still can’t sell directly in the United States, but that isn’t stopping Americans from noticing them. A new study from AutoPacific finds that 65% of U.S. consumers are now familiar with at least one Chinese car brand, up from just 52% in 2024. For the first time, more than half ...

descriptionSummary: Chinese automakers may not have direct sales in the US market yet, but their presence is gaining traction among American consumers. A recent study reveals that nearly two-thirds of US drivers are now familiar with at least one Chinese car brand.

title: Former Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares Has a Shocking Prediction for Automaker
description: According to a new report published by Bloomberg, former Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares says that the company he resigned from could face a potential breakup. descriptionSummary: A top executive's candid assessment has sparked concern over the future of Stellantis, a multinational auto giant with diverse global interests. Carlos Tavares' provocative comments hint at a possible fragmentation of the company's far-reaching business empire.

title: 2026 Toyota Sienna Gets Better Features—But is the 2025 Model a Smarter Buy?
description: Minivans are experiencing a bit of a resurgence in the United States this year, and the Toyota Sienna is one of the beneficiaries. Sales of the Sienna are already up by around 50% so far in 2025 relative to last year, and with the improvements Toyota just announced for the 2026 model, its ...
titleSummary: "Should You Hold Off on the New Sienna Until Next Year?"
descriptionSummary: The minivan market is seeing a notable comeback in the US this year, and Toyota's Sienna is riding high on the trend. With sales already surged by nearly 50% so far in 2025, it's poised to maintain momentum with enhanced features coming for the 2026 model.

title: Alfa Romeo’s Next Gamble: Staying Small to Survive
description: Alfa Romeo just got a big investment, but things aren't going well. Despite the brand's brand-new billion-euro platform, which underpinned the Giulia and Stelvio, the automaker failed to sell very well (despite the former driving rather well). titleSummary: "Scaling Down to Stay Afloat: Alfa's Bid for Long-Term Success"
descriptionSummary: Alfa Romeo has secured a significant investment, but its fortunes remain uncertain. Despite introducing a cutting-edge billion-euro platform, sales have been sluggish, and the brand's flagship models haven't yet achieved commercial success as expected.

title: Mitsubishi’s Cheapest SUV Is About to Get Even Cheaper
description: With the discontinuation of the Mirage and Mirage G4, Mitsubishi is reportedly planning to reposition the Outlander Sport as a more affordable entry point into its U.S. lineup. The compact SUV currently starts around $24,000, but according to Automotive News, insiders suggest a ...

descriptionSummary: Mitsubishi is poised to revamp its US market strategy by shifting focus to the Outlander Sport as an accessible gateway for budget-conscious buyers, potentially pricing it even lower than its current starting point of around $24,000.

title: SPIED: The Hybrid C63 Won't Be The Most Hated AMG Much Longer
description: The current Mercedes-AMG C 63 is powered by a 2.0-liter turbocharged four-cylinder hybrid. There are several terms in that powertrain description that have rubbed buyers the wrong way, so much so that Mercedes is reportedly considering backtracking on the decision with either a straight-six engine ...
titleSummary: "Exclusive Scoop: AMG's Unloved Hybrid C63 Loses Its Sins"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-AMG's C 63 has faced pushback over its current configuration, which features a turbocharged four-cylinder hybrid. In response, the manufacturer is rumored to be revisiting its powertrain strategy, potentially opting for a more traditional inline-six motor.

title: GM’s Dream Cars Gone in Flames, Including the 2026 Camaro?
description: A massive fire has torn through GM’s Advanced Design Center in California, potentially reducing some of the company’s most confidential designs to ashes. descriptionSummary: A catastrophic blaze swept through General Motors' elite design studio in California, threatening to incinerate sensitive blueprints for the automaker's most innovative future projects. This hub of creative genius was where groundbreaking ideas came to life.

title: Kia Already Planning to Redesign its First Pickup Truck
description: When Kia launched the Tasman, it became the Korean brand's first real attempt at building a truck designed for personal and recreational use, not just a small commercial vehicle—a real headline-maker that grabbed attention worldwide. descriptionSummary: Kia's Tasman marked a significant shift in the brand's truck strategy, transitioning from utilitarian workhorses to rugged vehicles designed for personal adventures and leisurely pursuits, sparking global interest with its bold, eye-catching aesthetic.

title: GM to Drop Apple CarPlay and Android Auto from All Vehicles
description: General Motors has confirmed it plans to remove Apple CarPlay and Android Auto from all future vehicles, expanding a controversial decision that previously applied only to its EV lineup. In an interview with The Verge, CEO Mary Barra said the move will eventually cover the company’s entire ...
titleSummary: GM Ditches Smartphone Integration in Future Models, Starting Next Year
descriptionSummary: General Motors is set to drop Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration from all new vehicles, building on a previous decision that initially targeted its electric vehicle lineup, according to comments made by CEO Mary Barra.

title: Toyota RAV4 PHEV’s Fast Charging Limited To Two Trims—Here’s Why
description: We just had the opportunity to get the wheel of the all-new 2026 Toyota RAV4, which is particularly quick in plug-in hybrid form. descriptionSummary: We took the wheel of the all-new Toyota RAV4, with its plug-in hybrid variant boasting impressive acceleration - a whopping 324 horsepower, outpacing its competitors. But what's just as exciting is its compatibility with high-speed charging technology.

title: Manual-Swapped 2006 Lamborghini Murciélago Roadster For Sale With 19,900 Miles
description: The Murciélago was never meant to be tame. Named after a legendary fighting bull that survived 24 sword strokes, this Lamborghini embodies defiance. titleSummary: Rare Exotic: '06 Lamborghini Murciélago Roadster Trades Hands with Low Mileage"
descriptionSummary: Meet the Murciélago, a Lamborghini born from rebellion. Inspired by an unyielding bull, this beast of a car unleashes a raw, 6.2-liter V12 roar that echoes through the ages. A manual transmission only adds to its untamed spirit.

title: Volkswagen Halts Golf Production Amid Chip Shortage

title: Soaring Tariffs Are About to Hit Car Buyers Hard
description: The third quarter was rough for General Motors, and likely won’t look much better for the rest of the industry, analysts warn. descriptionSummary: General Motors struggled in Q3, and experts predict a similar challenging outlook for the rest of the industry. Earnings plunged 50% for the Detroit giant, driven by a pivot towards electric vehicles and rising tariff costs.

title: We Love Japan's Punishment for Hit-and-Run Drivers
description: Imagine stepping out for a short errand and returning to your car only to see a big, glaring dent. Ah, the classic hit-and-run. title: Three Classic Bentley Sedans Reborn as Bespoke Flying Spurs

descriptionSummary: For those seeking refined luxury, a classic Bentley sedan is hard to beat, evoking timeless elegance and sophistication wherever it goes. In tribute, Bentley's latest celebration showcases three iconic sedans that have shaped the brand's heritage.

descriptionSummary: The 80-series Toyota Land Cruiser boasts impressive off-road prowess, thanks in part to its potent 1FZ-FE inline-six engine. This stalwart powerplant, introduced in the early 1990s, set a new standard for performance and refinement in the rugged SUV.

description: The Jeep Recon has been one of the most anticipated cars on our radar for some time now. descriptionSummary: The highly anticipated Jeep Recon has generated significant buzz, thanks in part to its distinctive design and competitive pricing, which makes it an attractive option compared to other EV offerings from the brand.

title: “An All-Electric Corvette That Feels Like a Corvette Is Not Easy Right Now,” Says GM President

descriptionSummary: GM is rapidly expanding its electrified lineup with plug-in options available across several popular SUVs and crossovers, including the Escalade IQ. This shift aims to significantly reduce carbon footprint and emissions.

title: Nissan's Newest EV Doesn't Need Charging – Will It Reach Production?
description: With the advent of EVs, the idea of running partly on solar power has been around for decades. descriptionSummary: Electric vehicles have long sparked interest in harnessing solar energy on the go. While early concepts and test runs existed, mass-market implementation has remained elusive due to numerous technological hurdles.

title: European Cities Warn That Accepting US Car Standards Will Risk European Lives

descriptionSummary: A coalition of government representatives from major European cities and over 75 regional non-profits has sounded the alarm to EU officials, urging them to re-examine key policies affecting the continent's future.

title: Free EV Charging at Home? Volvo’s Big New Perk Starts in Sweden
description: Volvo Cars is giving Swedish buyers of its fully electric models a reason to plug in at home. Beginning February 2026, the automaker will offer one year of free home charging through a partnership with energy supplier Vattenfall. The program grants customers up to 5,150 ...

descriptionSummary: Volvo is launching a new initiative for Swedish buyers of its electric vehicles, providing one year of complimentary home charging through a collaboration with energy provider Vattenfall, starting in February 2026.

descriptionSummary: Volkswagen's nostalgic ID. Buzz aimed to breathe new life into the iconic Microbus for the electric era, blending style and practicality with a dash of personality. However, nearly 12 months after its debut, enthusiasm has begun to wane. Production of the ID. Buzz has been temporarily halted at Volkswagen's Hanover facility in Germany.

title: Porsche Working on Radical New W18 Engine With Three Banks of Cylinders

titleSummary: "GM's Next Move: Hands-Free Driving and an Intelligent Co-Pilot on the Horizon"
descriptionSummary: General Motors unveiled innovative in-car technologies at a recent New York media event, including a hands-free driving feature and a conversational AI companion designed to redefine the future of transportation.

title: Kia Made a Gasoline-Scented Air Freshener for EV Drivers Missing the Smell of Fuel

The limited-edition item, shaped like a miniature jerrycan, was launched in Finland alongside the ...
titleSummary: "Kia Captures the Essence of Gas in Innovative Air Freshener for Electric Vehicle Owners"
descriptionSummary: Kia has introduced an unconventional accessory for electric vehicle owners, a nostalgic air freshener mimicking the scent of gasoline to evoke the familiar aroma of traditional driving.

title: The Fastest Electric Hypercar at the Nürburgring Can’t Beat Ford’s Mustang GTD

title: RECALL: Ford's Own Aftermarket Supercharger Kit Makes The Mustang Unsafe
description: Modifying a Ford Mustang with a supercharger kit certainly improves acceleration, but according to a new recall, it may lead to acceleration when you don't want it. descriptionSummary: A Ford Mustang's performance boost from a supercharger kit comes with a caveat - it can also lead to sudden and unwanted acceleration, prompting a safety recall by the National Highway Traffic Administration.

title: Tesla’s Power Trip Ends in a Recall for 13,000 Cars
description: Just when you thought it couldn’t get any worse for Elon Musk-led Tesla, the company announced a recall for nearly 13,000 vehicles in the United States. The announcement comes after Tesla discovered a battery defect that could completely cut drive power and leave drivers stranded without warning. ...

title: SPIED: BMW's Incredibly Popular Electric Crossover Gets A Taste Of M Flavor

descriptionSummary: With over a month since the unveiling of its sleek Neue Klasse-based iX3 crossover, BMW finds itself in an unexpected predicament: overwhelming demand has the company scrambling to keep up, despite the industry's current lukewarm reception to electric vehicles.

title: Turo Launches New Service as Alternative to Traditional Car Ownership
description: It says its newest features are "an affordable, convenient, and low-commitment alternative to traditional car ownership."
titleSummary: "Turo Takes the Wheel with Game-Changing Peer-to-Peer Car Sharing Platform"
descriptionSummary: The company's latest offering presents a budget-friendly and hassle-free way to get around without making long-term commitments associated with owning a vehicle outright.

descriptionSummary: After a prolonged quiet period, Tesla is finally shedding light on its eagerly anticipated new Roadster, a successor to its first sports car model. Expect an electrifying preview event by year's end, marking a significant milestone in the vehicle's development.

descriptionSummary: Lexus is shaking up its iconic LS brand with a radical new design: an electric, six-wheeled minivan that redefines luxury. Debuting at the Japan Mobility Show, it's all about expansive space and innovative mobility.

title: Rare 1991 GMC Syclone For Sale Is One Of The Coolest Trucks Ever Built
description: Back when compact, two-door pickup trucks were still around in the early 1990s, GMC had the wild idea to create a performance version of its Sonoma. Called the GMC Syclone, the pickup’s combination of small size, incredible turbocharged V6 power, and rarity have turned it into a proper cult ...
titleSummary: "Rare '91 GMC Syclone Hits Market: A Truck That Defines Automotive Cool"
descriptionSummary: In the early '90s, compact pickups were still a thing, and GM took a bold gamble by transforming its diminutive Sonoma into a high-performance beast. The resulting Syclone was a potent, turbocharged sensation that's since become a collector's holy grail.

title: Are Honda Prelude Buyers Really Cancelling After Test Drives?
description: The new Honda Prelude drummed up a lot of attention in its home market of Japan. Some positive, in terms of outselling its production allocation, and some not as much. With the new Prelude's performance figures falling short of some people's expectations, it was only a matter of time before the ...
titleSummary: "Drive and Decide: Mystery Surrounds Cancelled Purchases of Honda's Sporty Sedan"
descriptionSummary: The Honda Prelude's Japanese launch sparked intense interest, with both enthusiastic reception and disappointment. While it outsold initial projections, some fans were left underwhelmed by its performance capabilities, paving the way for future adjustments.

title: Tesla Will Hike Model 3 And Model Y Prices in November - But No One Knows By How Much
description: Tesla's website provides a vague message if you go to look at a Model 3 or a Model Y: "Price Increases in November." The website does not provide other information, and no information was given in the form of a press release. Tesla also does not have a PR department to contact for comment, which ...

descriptionSummary: Tesla's website now features a straightforward notification for the Model 3 and Model Y: price increases took effect in November. The company hasn't issued a formal announcement or provided additional details about these changes.
